title: United States : light vehicle sales by manufacturer 2017/18
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 15 different Car Manufacturers for 2 groups 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 2986737.0 among the 2 groups and in Tesla Motors, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 50067.0.
In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 15 Car Manufacturers and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
There is a gap of 2835956.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018 in Car Manufacturer General Motors and Volvo Cars North America.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL in Car Manufacturer General Motors and 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 15 different Car Manufacturers for 2 groups 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 2986737.0 among the 2 groups and in Tesla Motors, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 50067.0.
In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 15 Car Manufacturers and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
There is a gap of 2835956.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018 in Car Manufacturer General Motors and Volvo Cars North America.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 15 different Car Manufacturers for 2 groups 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
Car Manufacturer General Motors had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors for 2017.
Among all the Car Manufacturers, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 2934742.0 in Car Manufacturer General Motors and lowest value 98786.0 in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
Car Manufacturer General Motors and Volvo Cars North America had the biggest gap of 2835956.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018.
Among all 2 groups, 2017 had the gap of 2936670.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Car Manufacturer General Motors and Tesla Motors respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups 2017, and 2018, the Car Manufacturer General Motors is the maximum SOME LABEL and Volvo Cars North America is the minimum SOME LABEL.
